title: Forbidden
description: When love isn’t just worth the fight. It is the fight.Max Black is many things to me.A dangerous, compelling, notorious criminal.The tortured boy who has shown me kindness for as long as I remember.My father’s protégé and my step-mother’s ex.Emotionally unavailable.The only man I love, and the one I want in my bed.His four little words light a fire so deep that I burn from the inside whenever I hear them. Lately, I hear them often.‘Be very careful, Princess.’I will never stop fighting for what is destined. Not until his troubled heart is mine.***I exist on the wrong side of right, and I do whatever it takes to survive.In a soul so fractured with secrets and lies, Chloe Fox is the beautiful light to my darkness.She’s my princess, the one I’m sworn to protect, and she must never discover why I can’t be hers.She’s survived on my friendship, but now she wants everything, and my will is faltering.I’ve always sacrificed to save her, and this is the most important save of all.I have to save her from me.
author: L.J. Dee
